# openbare

> Decentralized web proxy network designed for censorship resistance, high availability. Deploy nodes on Vercel, Railway, Cloudflare Workers in seconds.  Use community-maintained public nodes. Features automatic failover between nodes, <50ms edge latency, built-in health monitoring, full compatibility with Ultraviolet, other TompHTTP clients.

## Overview

openbare is an open-source project by nirholas. Decentralized web proxy network designed for censorship resistance, high availability. Deploy nodes on Vercel, Railway, Cloudflare Workers in seconds.  Use community-maintained public nodes. Features automatic failover between nodes, <50ms edge latency, built-in health monitoring, full compatibility with Ultraviolet, other TompHTTP clients.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/openbare
- Language: JavaScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas
